comments:
Description:
Exception throws out when preview a report includes highlight or map[1102]

Build number: 
2.2.0.v20070515-0630

Steps to reproduce:
1, New a crosstab
2, Specify the highlight or map on the crosstab
   such as using the condition: data["column"] equals to "column"
3, Preview the results

Expected result:
The highlight and map work correctly and successfully

Actual result:
Exception occurs when preview the report

Error log:
There are errors evaluating script "data["PRODUCT_TYPE"]":{1}. 
Error.ScriptEvaluationError ( 1 time(s) )
detail : org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.EngineException: There are errors evaluating script "data["PRODUCT_TYPE"]":{1}. at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.executor.ExecutionContext.evaluate(ExecutionContext.java:568) at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.executor.ExecutionContext.evaluate(ExecutionContext.java:541) at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.executor.ExecutionContext.evaluateCondExpr(ExecutionContext.java:596) at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.data.dte.CubeResultSet.evaluate(CubeResultSet.java:159) at org.eclipse.birt.report.item.crosstab.core.re.executor.ContentUtil.setupHighlightStyle(ContentUtil.java:106) at org.eclipse.birt.report.item.crosstab.core.re.executor.ContentUtil.processStyle(ContentUtil.java:86) at org.eclipse.birt.report.item.crosstab.core.re.executor.ContentUtil.processStyle(ContentUtil.java:56) at org.eclipse.birt.report.item.crosstab.core.re.executor.BaseCrosstabExecutor.processStyle(BaseCrosstabExecutor.java:122) at org.eclipse.birt.report.item.crosstab.core.re.executor.CrosstabReportItemExecutor.execute(CrosstabReportItemExecutor.java:105) at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.executor.ExtendedItemExecutor.execute(ExtendedItemExecutor.java:114) at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.internal.executor.l18n.LocalizedReportItemExecutor.execute(LocalizedReportItemExecutor.java:36) at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.layout.html.HTMLPageLM.layoutChildren(HTMLPageLM.java:124) at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.layout.html.HTMLPageLM.layout(HTMLPageLM.java:82) at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.layout.html.HTMLReportLayoutEngine.layout(HTMLReportLayoutEngine.java:88) at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.impl.RunAndRenderTask.doRun(RunAndRenderTask.java:205) at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.impl.RunAndRenderTask.run(RunAndRenderTask.java:125)

Verified on v20070601-0630 build
closed and regards~
